name: Shrimp Stir Fry with Bok Choy, Diced Tomatoes, and Rice Noodles
author: Deb C
summary: A flavorful quick and easy dinner, perfect for busy days. Be sure to use fresh ginger and garlic for maximum flavor.
ingredients: 1 pound jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Place noodles in a large bowl and cover with hot water
Set aside until noodles are softened, about 15 minutes
Mix soy sauce, water, rice wine, brown sugar, grated ginger, and cornstarch together in a mixing bowl
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add red pepper flakes and chopped garlic; stir and fry for 1 minute
Add the shrimp and bok choy; saute until shrimp is pink and cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes
Stir in tomatoes and soy sauce mixture
Cook until mixture begins to thicken, 2 to 3 minutes
Place cooked noodles in a warmed serving bowl
Pour shrimp mixture over the noodles
